title: Aiko, Dreamer's Last Hope

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Choose someone to protect each night. You will completely nullify any attacks dealt towards them, and lower your defense by one for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Attribute:
fields.value:
-Your defense may never be tampered with by any role other than yourself. Meaning protective roles cant grant you defense, other roles cant lower your defense, etc etc
-If you ever go below None Defense, you die.

desc:
Post 1531
*You can't give up just yet! Fight on!*
